text: Dughiar avɨribar kɨ saghuiabar ghua, egha dɨpabar ovengasava ami, egha okɨmakɨar gumazibar dafaribar atam ovei. Egha uan adarasi Judabar dafaribar atam ovia, egha uaghan Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar dafaribar atam ovei. Egha nguibar ekiabar aven atam ovei. Egha ruaribagh arua atam ovei. Egha ongarim gisɨn arua atam ovei. Egha ifavarir Kraisɨn adarazir dafaribar atam ovei.
